GapFillInput.Title: Past simple questions
GapFillInput.Instruction: Read Martina’s diary. Read the answers and then write the questions.

P.FONT: This morning I went to my economics class – it was very boring. After class I met Vicky and we had lunch together at the Metro Bar. I came home and studied all afternoon. In the evening I watched Lost on television.

We had a test this morning, on international law. It wasn’t good. I didn’t finish it! I met Steve for a coffee and we decided to go to the cinema in the afternoon. We saw Metroville. I thought it was okay but not very exciting. Steve liked it.
I didn’t go to classes today. I didn’t feel well so I stayed in bed all day. I got up this evening and listened to some music on the radio. Tomorrow we’ve got another test … on economics!

Content.Question:
1. Where did she go|Where did Martina go|What did she do|What did Martina do on Monday morning?
She went to her economics class.
2. Was it|Was the economics class|Was the class interesting?
No, it wasn’t. It was boring.
3. Who did she meet|Who did Martina meet for lunch?
She met Vicky.
4. Where did she|Where did Martina|Where did they have lunch?
At the Metro Bar.
5. What did she do|What did Martina do in the afternoon?
She studied.
6. What did she watch|What did Martina watch in the evening?
Lost.
7. What did she|What did Martina and Steve|What did they decide to do on Tuesday afternoon?
They decided to go to the cinema.
8. Did he like|Did Steve like the film?
Yes, he did.
9. Why did she stay|Why did Martina stay in bed on Wednesday?
Because she didn’t feel well.
10. What did she listen to|What did Martina listen to on the radio?
She listened to music.
